column1: aida carmen thacker| aida carmen diaz beloved daughter of the late eugenia (ortiz) and jesus diaz. born in puerto rico
column2: she moved to new york city when she met and married james thacker (deceased). a loving mother of gene (deceased)
column13: cory and ariel and 5 great grandchildren. she enjoyed her time working for the health and welfare council of baltimore where she served as a translator. always out going and with a smile aida enjoyed meeting people and made numerous friends where she went and will be missed by everyone who knew her. cemetery details. most holy. redemer cemeterymd
